summary: TAKE AMERICA BACK ($USA) - We're thrilled to have you join our community here at $USA. We are the only Erc20 token whose contract is hardcoded to donate our taxes in USDC straight to Trump's campaign. Our innovative project is designed to automatically direct our taxes as donations in the form of USDC to support Donald Trump. With $USA, we're not just building a token; we're fostering a movement for financial sovereignty and empowerment. This is more than a financial venture, it's a movement fueled by and for the people, aimed at restoring the values that define our great nation. We the people can and will make a difference. Join us as we 'TAKE America back' $USA.
